query.name: check_if_daily_stat_already_exists
query.sql: Select * from statistic s where s.date = #bind($date 'TIMESTAMP')

query.name: count_books
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from book b LEFT JOIN entry e ON (b.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_chapters
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from book_chapter b LEFT JOIN entry e ON (b.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_entries
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from entry e WHERE e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_fileentries
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from file f LEFT JOIN entry e ON (f.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_headlines
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from headline h LEFT JOIN entry e ON (h.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_html
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from html h LEFT JOIN entry e ON (h.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_journals
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from journal_article a LEFT JOIN entry e ON (a.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: count_non_free_scannable_files
query.sql: SELECT count(*) as count FROM ( SELECT bc.id, bc.resourceid, 'book_chapter' AS type FROM book_chapter bc UNION SELECT ja.id, ja.resourceid, 'journal_article' AS type FROM journal_article ja) AS scannable INNER JOIN resource res ON scannable.resourceid = res.id WHERE res.filepath IS NOT NULL AND res.copyrightreviewstatus NOT IN (3, 6);

query.name: count_reservecollections_for_status
query.sql: Select count(*) from reserve_collection rc WHERE rc.status = $status

query.name: count_totalfiles
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from resource r LEFT JOIN entry e ON (r.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL AND r.filepath IS NOT NULL

query.name: count_weblinks
query.sql: Select count(*) as count from web_link w LEFT JOIN entry e ON (w.id = e.id) where e.deleted IS NULL

query.name: delete_permissions_by_instanceid
query.sql: delete from permission where instanceid = $instanceID

query.name: delete_permissions_by_role
query.sql: DELETE FROM permission p WHERE p.instanceid = $objectID AND p.userid IN ( SELECT part.userid FROM participation part WHERE part.roleid = $roleID )

query.name: end_participations
query.sql: delete from participation p where p.reserveCollectionId = $collectionID

query.name: end_participations_by_role
query.sql: delete from participation p where p.roleId = $roleID and p.reserveCollectionId = $collectionID

query.name: select_access_log_count
query.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM ACCESS_LOG WHERE resource = $resource AND resourceID = $resourceID AND action = $action AND timestamp >= $start AND timestamp <= $end

query.name: select_collections_by_permission
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT r.* FROM reserve_collection r LEFT JOIN participation part ON part.reservecollectionid = r.id LEFT JOIN permission p ON r.id = p.instanceid INNER JOIN action a ON p.actionid = a.id WHERE a.resource = '$resource' AND a.name = '$name' AND p.userid = $userID AND part.enddate IS NULL

query.name: select_collections_by_role
query.sql: SELECT r.* FROM reserve_collection r LEFT JOIN participation p on r.id = p.reservecollectionid WHERE (r.status = 1 OR r.status = 2) AND (p.roleid = $roleID and p.userid = $userID) AND p.endDate IS NULL

query.name: select_collections_by_user
query.sql: SELECT r.* FROM reserve_collection r LEFT JOIN participation p on r.id = p.reservecollectionid WHERE p.userid = $userID and p.endDate IS NULL

query.name: select_free_numbers_by_location_ordered_by_number_asc
query.sql: SELECT #result('number' 'java.lang.Integer') FROM RESERVE_COLLECTION_NUMBER n WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM RESERVE_COLLECTION c LEFT JOIN LIBRARY_LOCATION l ON c.libraryLocationId = l.id WHERE n.number = c.rcNumberId AND l.id = $locationId AND c.status = 2) ORDER BY n.number ASC;

query.name: select_global_roles_by_user
query.sql: select r.* from role r left join global_role gr on r.id = gr.roleId where gr.userId = $userID

query.name: select_larger_than_max_numbers_by_location
query.sql: SELECT #result('number' 'java.lang.Integer') FROM RESERVE_COLLECTION_NUMBER WHERE number > ALL (SELECT n.number FROM RESERVE_COLLECTION_NUMBER n LEFT JOIN RESERVE_COLLECTION c ON n.number = c.rcnumberid LEFT JOIN LIBRARY_LOCATION l ON c.librarylocationid = l.id WHERE l.id = $locationId) ORDER BY number ASC

query.name: select_non_free_scannable_resources
query.sql: SELECT res.* FROM ( SELECT bc.id, bc.resourceid, 'book_chapter' AS type FROM book_chapter bc UNION SELECT ja.id, ja.resourceid, 'journal_article' AS type FROM journal_article ja) AS scannable INNER JOIN resource res ON scannable.resourceid = res.id WHERE res.filepath IS NOT NULL AND res.copyrightreviewstatus NOT IN (3, 6) ORDER BY res.id OFFSET $offset

query.name: select_resources_by_collection
query.sql: SELECT t0.copyrightReviewStatus, t0.filePath, t0.fullTextURL, t0.mimeType, t0.id FROM RESOURCE t0 LEFT JOIN BOOK_CHAPTER t1 ON (t0.id = t1.resourceID) LEFT JOIN ENTRY t2 ON (t1.id = t2.id) LEFT JOIN RESERVE_COLLECTION t3 ON (t2.reserveCollectionId = t3.id) LEFT JOIN JOURNAL_ARTICLE t4 ON (t0.id = t4.resourceID) LEFT JOIN ENTRY t5 ON (t4.id = t5.id) LEFT JOIN RESERVE_COLLECTION t6 ON (t5.reserveCollectionId = t6.id) LEFT JOIN FILE t7 ON (t0.id = t7.resourceID) LEFT JOIN ENTRY t8 ON (t7.id = t8.id) LEFT JOIN RESERVE_COLLECTION t9 ON (t8.reserveCollectionId = t9.id) WHERE (((t2.deleted IS NULL) AND t3.id = $collectionID) OR ((t5.deleted IS NULL) AND t6.id = $collectionID) OR ((t8.deleted IS NULL) AND t9.id = $collectionID));

query.name: select_statistics_for_range
query.sql: Select * from statistic s where s.date >= #bind($from 'TIMESTAMP') and s.date <= #bind($to 'TIMESTAMP') order by s.date ASC

query.name: select_unrelated_actions_of_role
query.sql: select a.* from action a where a.id not in ( select pd.actionid from permission_definition pd where pd.roleid = $roleID )

query.name: select_whole_statistics
query.sql: Select * from statistic s order by s.date ASC
